sentences.sentence: Objective To evaluate the efficacy of the Titanium minitype plate and screw in the treatment of metacarpus fracture.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨钛质微型钢板螺钉治疗掌骨骨折的疗效。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To explore the effect of micro-external fixation device for treating the basilar part fracture of the first metacarpus.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨应用外固定器治疗第一掌骨基底部骨折的临床效果。

sentences.sentence: A supporting bone of the leg in some hoofed mammals, analogous to the metacarpus of the hand or the metatarsus of the foot in human beings.
sentences.translation: 某些哺乳动物的腿部起支撑作用的骨头，相当于人类手中的掌骨或足部的跖骨。
